name: Shinobi Showdown (Tariq T.)
description:
Shinobi Showdown is a 2D pixel platformer that tests your skills as a ninja. In order to restore peace to your homeland, you must gather all three aura orbs, and defeat the evil ninja clans. Do you have what it takes to be an honorary shinobi? 

*This game will receive more updates in the coming weeks.*

Controls:

W: Jump

A: Left

D: Right 

Space Bar: Attack
